params.instruction_str:
Look at these questions. Can you complete the sentences?

If you don't know or you're not sure which alternative is correct, you should study the unit(s) shown in English Grammar in Use.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><choose id="total"><sgl> question</sgl><pl> questions</pl></choose><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.text: Our son Matthew was born _____ the 21st June 2009.
question.modelAnswerString: Our son Matthew was born on the 21st June 2009.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><choose id="total"><sgl> question</sgl><pl> questions</pl></choose><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.text: 'This traffic is terrible. It's nearly 2 o'clock.' 'I know. I hope we'll be _____ the start of the meeting.'
question.modelAnswerString:
'This traffic is terrible. It's nearly 2 o'clock.' 'I know. I hope we'll be in time for the start of
the meeting.'

params.text: Unit 122   On time and in time   At the end and in the end
params.label: Study:

question.text: The weather was so nice the children spent the whole day playing _____ the garden.
question.modelAnswerString: The weather was so nice the children spent the whole day playing in the garden.

question.text: 'Where is your new office, Charles?' 'It's _____ the fifth floor. Room 243.'
question.modelAnswerString: 'Where is your new office, Charles?' 'It's on the fifth floor. Room 243.'

question.modelAnswerString: 'Did you hear that Jack lost his job last week?' 'I know. I feel so sorry for him.'

question.text: 'Don't you want to watch television?' 'No. I'm trying to _____ this work. Can you turn it off?'
question.modelAnswerString:
'Don't you want to watch television?' 'I'm trying to concentrate on this work. Can you turn
it off?'
